text:
We are very excited
to be welcoming

our third cohort of BiGS
Fellows for this academic year.

It's a wonderful
group of scholars

who are focused on
issues of climate change

and issues of racial
and gender equity.

These are both topics that
we've been dedicating ourselves
to for the past two years now.

And it's just been
such a joy to be

able to bring these
scholars to campus

and to see how their work gets
strengthened and empowered

by being here and how
our community equally

gets strengthened and
empowered by learning

from the work they're doing and
the pursuits they're continuing
